column4: Hi guys sorry to bug. Kind of new and really don't want to use the Word Microsoft in this chat but here it goes. Is there a way to have Identities setup in Evolution much the same as Outlook Express, where email from two seperate accounts does not go in the same Inbox.
you can either use filters ... or use vfolders
, nope ... just go to tools -> filter editor inside evolution
if you sort the emails into their own "Inboxes" you can do this with a filter run when the mail comes in
